group.description:
This group embraces the traditionalism of those pioneers of the 1940s, 1950s, and 1960s known as the New Conservatives. The New Conservatives were a loose group of conservative academics and scholars who after the crisis of World War II revived interest in Western civilization and American cultural renewal. The New Conservatives also brought about a renaissance in the study of the life and work of Anglo-Irish statesman and philosopher Edmund Burke. Their immediate forebears included the New Humanists, the Distributists, T. S. Eliot, Ralph Adams Cram, C. S. Lewis, Herbert Agar, Bernard Iddings Bell, Christopher Dawson, and the Southern Agrarians.

Others that have joined the campaign are the Teachers‚Äô Retirement System, the New York City Employees‚Äô Retirement System, and the Board of Education Retirement System. These pension funds have a combined 1.1 million shares in Mastercard, with an approximate value of $347.59 million, and 67,200 shares in American Express, with an approximate value of $92.49 million. However, there is no code for firearms and ammunition stores.The bank leading the push, the Amalgamated Bank. recently submitted an application to the International Organization for Standardization, which creates the codes, asking for a new classification for stores that sell guns and ammunition. From: http://reclaimthenet.org
NYC to use pension fund investments to push Mastercard
and American Express to flag gun sales
Elected officials in New York City and three of the city‚Äôs pension funds are pushing credit card providers American Express and Mastercard to start tracking spending on firearms, in an effort to catch suspicious sales.

Earlier this week, the Gothamist reported that about 50 state lawmakers in New York had written a letter to Mastercard and American Express asking them to start coding sales of firearms and ammunition under a special category so that law enforcement can easily track these sales.

Mayor Eric Adams, Attorney General Letitia James, Comptroller Brad Lander have joined that call. Others that have joined the campaign are the Teachers‚Äô Retirement System, the New York City Employees‚Äô Retirement System, and the Board of Education Retirement System. These pension funds have a combined 1.1 million shares in Mastercard, with an approximate value of $347.59 million, and 67,200 shares in American Express, with an approximate value of $92.49 million. The pension funds are using their positions as shareholders to push the credit card providers to take action.

Credit card providers already classify spending into different categories, called the merchant category codes, which are based on where the money is spent. However, there is no code for firearms and ammunition stores.

The bank leading the push, the Amalgamated Bank. recently submitted an application to the International Organization for Standardization, which creates the codes, asking for a new classification for stores that sell guns and ammunition. In the past, the bank has submitted a similar request without success, and it is believed the effort was thwarted by major credit card providers.

https://reclaimthenet.org/nyc-to-use-pension-fund-push-mastercard-and-am-ex/

From: http://reclaimthenet.org
*Coming to Canada soon? Maybe for hunting seasons?*

**NYC to use pension fund investments to push Mastercard** 
**and American Express to flag gun sales**

Elected officials in New York City and three of the city‚Äôs pension funds are pushing credit card providers American Express and Mastercard to start tracking spending on firearms, in an effort to catch suspicious sales.

Earlier this week, the Gothamist reported that about 50 state lawmakers in New York had written a letter to Mastercard and American Express asking them to start coding sales of firearms and ammunition under a special category so that law enforcement can easily track these sales.

Mayor Eric Adams, Attorney General Letitia James, Comptroller Brad Lander have joined that call. Others that have joined the campaign are the Teachers‚Äô Retirement System, the New York City Employees‚Äô Retirement System, and the Board of Education Retirement System. These pension funds have a combined 1.1 million shares in Mastercard, with an approximate value of $347.59 million, and 67,200 shares in American Express, with an approximate value of $92.49 million. The pension funds are using their positions as shareholders to push the credit card providers to take action.

‚ÄúUsing our pension dollars to ensure that it is helping lives, not destroying lives ‚Äì this is the responsibility we have,‚Äù Adams said.
Credit card providers already classify spending into different categories, called the merchant category codes, which are based on where the money is spent. However, there is no code for firearms and ammunition stores.

The bank leading the push, the Amalgamated Bank. recently submitted an application to the International Organization for Standardization, which creates the codes, asking for a new classification for stores that sell guns and ammunition. In the past, the bank has submitted a similar request without success, and it is believed the effort was thwarted by major credit card providers.
https://reclaimthenet.org/nyc-to-use-pension-fund-push-mastercard-and-am-ex/

One doesn‚Äôt HAVE TO do things pertaining to Christianity, he or she GETS to. HUMONGOUS difference.)

‚ÄúSalvation by works‚Äù never works. No one is saved BY good works but rather UNTO them. HUMONGOUS difference (Isaiah 64:6, Matthew 5:13-16, John 6:29, Ephesians 2:8-10, Titus 3:4-8). It is impossible to goody two shoes into Heaven. Jesus did 100% of everything salvation-wise (Mark 1:15, John 14:6, John 19:30). By comparison, a human does 100% of nothing (John 15:5). Salvation‚Äôs a GIFT, not a ‚ÄúWAGE‚Äù (Romans 6:23).

There are no contradictions in Scripture...EVER.

Good morning‚ùó ‚òïüá∫üá∏

‚úùÔ∏è üìúüåÑ
Daily Bible verse
My God sent His angel and shut the lions‚Äô mouths and they have not harmed me, inasmuch as I was found innocent before Him; and also toward you, O king, I have committed no crime.‚Äù
Daniel 6:22

üåÑ Morning prayer
Lord, give us the heart of a lion, the humility of a lamb and the wisdom to know when to let each side show. *
üôè In Jesus' name we pray. Amen.

üåÑ Good will is a conscious act beginning in the heart.
Let's all make the day count.*

*Charlie Daniels

üì£ It's Sunday, September 4, 2022, and the Obama/Biden administration was/(is) the most corrupt in US history. #Obamagate.
- Dan Bongino

‚è±üí£ 1 Year and 227 Days of a "hostage situation." -Juanita Broaddrick

üá∫üá∏üñãÔ∏èBiden Executive actions: 549 as of August 31, 2022, including 96 executive orders, 97 presidential memoranda, 299 proclamations, and 57 notices. (Ballotpedia)
The Biden Recession is here. Unemployment rate is 3.7%. But the labor force participation rate edged DOWN to 62.1% in July. 50% of employers anticipate job cuts in the next six months.

Gas is $3.80/gallon. (AAA) Inflation is 8.5%.üò° Biden says it's 0%.ü§•
Feds raised the interest rate .75 again last month.

RCP averages: Joe's job approval rating spread is -12.7%.
His job approval avg: 42.1%. (Reuters says 38%, -20 spread.)

Build The Wall
DC mayor Bowser is upset that her city shelters are being "overrun" with illegal aliens. Now Eric Adams has opened 14 luxury hotels in NYC free to the illegals. Nearly 5 MILLION illegals have skipped across Joe's border already. TX Gov Abbott has now added Chicago to the list of cities he is bussing illegals to. Question: Is the UN financing illegals?

On Covid
The CDC relaxes its stance on Covid and allows people to make their own decisions since 95% of Americans 16 and older have some resistance to
Covid-19 ‚ùó The üêò in the room: "Young, healthy people are dying in large
numbers by collapsing".
‚û°Ô∏è The UK starts paying out big bucks for injuries and deaths caused by the experimental Covid jab.‚¨ÖÔ∏è

Current events.
Now Joe's back from vacation to hand out 300 billion dollars, or is that a trillion, to pay off college student loans. Unconstitutional‚ùó Congress controls the purse strings.
Biden gave his dark, divisive, speech on the "soul of the nation" at Independence Hall, Philadelphia, calling out MAGA as terrorists. I did NOT watch. His presidency and his party are in the tank. Curiously, none of the major networks or Fox broadcast the speech.

SCOTUS had a remarkable early 2022‚ùó WHO is the SCOTUS leaker‚ùì WE have not forgotten this matter.

China announced more drills after the second bunch of dem politicians flew to Taiwan. Billions more US dollars sent to Ukraine.

Liz Cheney lost ‚ùó üëã

‚õ¥Ô∏è ‚õìÔ∏è
Food shortages and supply chain issues abound. Fire Mayor Pete‚ùó

POTUS 45
Trump wins the Dallas CPAC with 69% of the vote.
Merrick Garland authorized the FBI RAID on Mar-A-Lago. FBI returns DJT's passports.
Biden White House involved, reports Breitbart. ‚ÄúThe best thinking is that an incumbent president cannot waive the right of the previous president('s executive privilege.) It would make a mockery of the whole notion of privilege,‚Äù Allen Dershowitz. Do you hear that, Joe?
The "more than heavily" redacted documents are released.üôÑ
U.S. District Judge Aileen Cannon said she will issue a ruling at some point on whether to appoint a so-called special master in the Trump vs DOJ case, but declined to say when.

Durham Report
Can there be justice in DC?

Today is National Wildlife Day ‚ùó

Creative Commons
